title: No Vi interaction on Pulsefire Cait
body: Seriously Rito wtf. Biggest let down ever!

replies.body: The biggest let down was Taric not getting an interaction with Ezreal.
Maybe Riot want kill the meme.
Probably. They go around killing all other memes these days.
Blood Moon Diana, Baker Pantheon, Graves's cigar, Yorick's rework, Ao Shin/Aurelion Sol, Taric x Ezreal...BUT they can't kill Ryze's reworks.
They still need to make a Yorick skin. He hasn't had one since release.

One is coming for him, sometime within the next 12 months.

And, we have reason to believe that it could be quite the skin: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/tFLqnHcY-the-next-ultimate-skin-part-2
Such a truly, truly, truly outrageous truth!
They can never kill Death Recap though.

But the best was when Lux got a taunt with Ezreal saying, "Are we supposed to be... dating... or something? We've never even talked."  Lux confirmed as Ezreal's beard, EzrealxTaric secret lovers confirmed.

...I'm guessing Taric "interacts" with Ezreal in such a way it's action before words.
Remember how secretive he is about what went on on Mount Targon. If you ever did something bad or otherwise unhygienical...it's not like you would tell, right?
What

THIS

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
fun fact: cait does not need vi for her to be an interesting champion and same vice versa

That's not the point though. They're partners, their lores are deeply interconnected and they even share easter egg passives and Vi has special taunts for Cait. Not adding Vi this time is mind boggling, specially since they added those for other skinlines (even for bloodmoon ffs).

thats fair enough but i meant more so a skin that is legendary tier thats supposed to be an alternate take on caitlyn where shes a time cop hunting down ez

she even doesnt wear a top hat 

https://media.giphy.com/media/EtxR3JdssyY8M/giphy-downsized-large.gif

Still would have been great for her to have interactions with Vi.
They are my favourite duo in this game.

And just because Pulsefire Caitlyn isn't wearing a top hat all the time doesn't mean she isn't wearing one at all.
https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/e15/18252765_210867652738202_1338444979189579776_n.jpg
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Fun fact: special interactions are meant to allude to lore as a fun little something extra.

What if she comes from a timeline where she never met Vi?
What if that's why she's so advanced: Vi never held her back?

Those interactions aren't supposed to necessarily be taken seriously. PF Cait has a 4th wall breaking line about Ryze's reworks ffs (awesome btw). SG Jinx has a taunt for Vi even though SG is a completely new/separate universe. And even if PF Cait is specifically intended to not know Vi for some reason, there should at least be an interaction addressing that (kinda like Lux's with Ez). But having absolutely no interaction at all like the two of them were complete unrelated? Talk about lame.

I would like to think that if Vi ever actually did hold Caitlyn back, if Caitlyn knew it she would never say it wasn't worth it.

People quit high paying jobs just because they don't like it there. I refuse to believe Caitlyn would have cut Vi out of her life if she knew it would lead her to greater success.

I don't know dude, I'd give up my best friends for a cool space gun that transforms into a chair and a motorcycle and also sick time travel capabilities and an almost complete understanding of time and how it works.

I'm sure we'd all live a life of isolation, or ditch our friends if we could get cool friggin' superpowers because we did.

that's sick and disgusting.

I love it.
Now you know what it felt like having {{champion:136}}  not interact with {{champion:45}}
At least a reference to "fathand" needs to be there!
EXACTLY! Riot better have a good reason why she has no interactions for Vi! Not ever a response taunt to Vi's taunts!
"were not lovers in this time line go back yo ekko" {{champion:51}}
well now its a weird love triangle where {{champion:254}} X {{champion:245}} X {{champion:222}}

Sorry but seeing her make that quote made me assume she's dating a certain red hair pirate hunter. Too bad there isn't even quotes for the bilgewater champs but she does jump into Bilgewater in one of her back animations.
